answers.answer: Sometimes ultrasounds are wrong. You could always ask for another.  I had dreams I was having a boy, but I had a girl. We didn't find out the gender until birth.
Did you want a boy ? Sometimes u dream of what u really wanted

question: On my 21 week ultrasound my doctor said I was having a girl even though we couldn't really see.  She said there was 3 lines so team pink. But recently I've been having dreams that it's a boy. Could the doctor be wrong? I go to the doc tom for the diabetes test. Do you think I can ask her to double check?
title: could the doctors be wrong?
